column1: Common Bond Bistro & Bakery - Montrose////This was actually an incredibly disappointing experience
column2: but for a very lame reason. I came here with a friend on Sunday at around 2:30 pm
column3: and we ordered some pastries to wait for the lunch menu that we expected after 3. Unfortunately
column4: the restaurant only serves brunch until 3
column5: so we had to go somewhere else for real food
column6: but that was our fault for not looking into it.
